fields.title: How to Submit a Form
fields.content:
1. Navigate to your facility's form list.
  2. Click on the form you wish to fill out.
  3. Complete all required fields marked with an asterisk (*).
  4. Click the Submit button at the bottom.

fields.title: Can I Edit a Submitted Form?
fields.content:
In most cases, only supervisors can edit submitted forms.

  1. Contact your supervisor or administrator.
  2. Alternatively, submit a new version and reference the old one.

fields.title: How to Customize My Dashboard
fields.content:
1. Click the gear icon ⚙️ in the top right of your dashboard.
  2. Toggle which cards you want visible.
  3. Drag and drop cards to reorder them.

fields.title: How to Add a New User
fields.content:
1. Go to the Admin > User Management page.
  2. Click “Add New User”.
  3. Enter the required info and choose their permission level.
  4. Click “Create User”. They’ll receive an email invite.

fields.title: How to Update My Payment Method
fields.content:
1. Go to the Billing page in the sidebar.
  2. Click “Update Card” under Payment Method.
  3. Enter your new card details and save.
